title: Part A
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria and/or examples, and to score the response.

One point for stating that levels of employment in agriculture declined in both Latin America and the Caribbean and East Asia and the Pacific during this time period.

Two points for comparing the rate or level of the decline in employment in agriculture in both regions during this time period.
descriptions: The response does not correctly explain one of the following comparisons of the trend lines:
The response correctly states the following comparison of the trend lines:
The response correctly explains one of the following comparisons of the trend lines:

title: Part B
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria and/or examples, and to score the response.

One point for stating that transnational migration patterns contribute to decreased agricultural employment at the global scale.

Two points for explaining the relationship between transnational migration patterns and a decline in agricultural employment at the global scale.
descriptions: The response does not correctly explain one of the following degrees to which transnational migration patterns have affected agricultural employment at the global scale:
The response correctly states one of the following degrees to which transnational migration patterns have affected agricultural employment at the global scale:
The response correctly explains one of the following degrees to which transnational migration patterns have affected agricultural employment at the global scale:

title: Part C
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria and/or examples, and to score the response.

One point for stating that the graph does not provide any specific information about global food distribution networks.

Two points for explaining the trend lines do not provide any specific information about the processes or spatial relationships that led to declines in employment in agriculture.
descriptions: The response does not correctly explain one of the following limitations of the data in the graph to explain the impacts of global food distribution networks on the agricultural percentage of the workforce:
The response correctly states the following limitation of the data in the graph to explain the impacts of global food distribution networks on the agricultural percentage of the workforce:
The response correctly explains one of the following limitations of the data in the graph to explain the impacts of global food distribution networks on the agricultural percentage of the workforce:

title: Part D
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria and/or examples, and to score the response.

One point for stating that declining employment in agriculture in sub-Saharan Africa/South Asia/East Asia and Pacific/Latin America and Caribbean indicates a decline in subsistence farming.

Two points for explaining the relationship between declining employment in agriculture and declines in subsistence farming.
descriptions: The response does not correctly explain how one of the following changes in the region’s percent of the workforce engaged in agriculture will affect subsistence farming:
The response correctly states how the following change in the region’s percent of the workforce engaged in agriculture will affect subsistence farming:
The response correctly explains how one of the following changes in the region’s percent of the workforce engaged in agriculture will affect subsistence farming:
